languages.text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} или нет, не нравится мне это... чую, лучше {rt_mf|ему|ей} не попадаться. А чуйка у меня — во!" {n}Слуга делает неопределенный жест руками и поеживается, оглядываясь за плечо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} или нет, не нравится мне это... чую, лучше {mf|ему|ей} не попадаться. А чуйка у меня — во!" {n}Слуга делает неопределенный жест руками и поеживается, оглядываясь за плечо.{/n}

languages.text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} или нет, не нравится мне это... чую, лучше {rt_mf|ему|ей} не попадаться. А чуйка у меня — во!" {n}Слуга делает неопределенный жест руками и поеживается, оглядываясь за плечо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... my gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|him|her} way. And how far do I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant makes a vague gesture with his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders a little.{/n}

"Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... my gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|him|her} way. And how far do I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant makes a vague gesture with his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders a little.{/n}

"Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|him|her} way. And how far do I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant makes a vague gesture with his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

"Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|him|her} way. And how far do I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant makes a vague gesture with his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

"Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

"Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

languages.text: “不管这个人是不是来自上界的大人，我都感觉不妙……我的直觉告诉我最好离{rt_mf|他|她}远点。你们知道我有多相信直觉吗？我从来没怀疑过！”{n}这个仆人挥了挥手，回头看了一眼，微微打了个冷颤。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不管这个人是不是来自上界的大人，我都感觉不妙……我的直觉告诉我最好离{rt_mf|他|她}远点。你们知道我有多相信直觉吗？我从来没怀疑过！”{n}这个仆人挥了挥手，回头看了一眼，微微打了个冷颤。{/n}

languages.text: «Celestial o no, esto no me gusta... Mi intuición me dice que es mejor no acercarnos, y confío plenamente en ella». {n}El sirviente agita la mano, mira por encima del hombro y se estremece.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Celestial o no, esto no me gusta... Mi intuición me dice que es mejor no acercarnos, y confío plenamente en ella». {n}El sirviente agita la mano, mira por encima del hombro y se estremece.{/n}

languages.text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} olsun ya da olmasın, bundan hoşlanmadım... İçimden bir ses onun yolundan uzak durmanın daha iyi olduğunu söylüyor. İçgüdülerime ne kadar güvendiğimi biliyor musunuz? Sonuna kadar!" {n}Hizmetkâr elini sallıyor, omzunun üzerinden bakıyor ve hafifçe ürperiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} olsun ya da olmasın, bundan hoşlanmadım... İçimden bir ses onun yolundan uzak durmanın daha iyi olduğunu söylüyor. İçgüdülerime ne kadar güvendiğimi biliyor musunuz? Sonuna kadar!" {n}Hizmetkâr elini sallıyor, omzunun üzerinden bakıyor ve hafifçe ürperiyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}であろうとなかろうと、こんなのは嫌いだね…あの人に関わらない方がいい気がするよ。どこまで直観を信じるかって？どこまでもさ！」{n}使用人は手を振り、ビクビクしながら、わずかに震える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}であろうとなかろうと、こんなのは嫌いだね…あの人に関わらない方がいい気がするよ。どこまで直観を信じるかって？どこまでもさ！」{n}使用人は手を振り、ビクビクしながら、わずかに震える。{/n}

languages.text: « {rt_mf|Seigneur|Seigneure} Céleste ou non, j'aime pas ça... Mon instinct me dit de me tenir aussi loin {rt_mf|de lui|d'elle} que possible. Et vous savez à quel point je fais confiance à mon instinct ? À 100 % ! » {n}Le serviteur fait un signe de la main, regarde par-dessus son épaule et frissonne légèrement.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « {rt_mf|Seigneur|Seigneure} Céleste ou non, j'aime pas ça... Mon instinct me dit de me tenir aussi loin {rt_mf|de lui|d'elle} que possible. Et vous savez à quel point je fais confiance à mon instinct ? À 100 % ! » {n}Le serviteur fait un signe de la main, regarde par-dessus son épaule et frissonne légèrement.{/n}

languages.text: "{rt_mf|Himmlischer Herr|Himmlische Herrin} oder nicht, mir gefällt das nicht ... Mein Bauch sagt mir, man sollte {rt_mf|ihm|ihr} lieber aus dem Weg gehen. Wisst Ihr, wie sehr ich meinem Bauch vertraue? Absolut!" {n}Der Diener winkt, schaut über seine Schulter und schaudert leicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} or not, I don't like this... My gut tells me it's better to stay out of {rt_mf|his|her} way. You know how far I trust my gut? All the way!" {n}The servant waves his hand, looks over his shoulder, and shudders slightly.{/n}

Wisst Ihr, wie sehr ich meinem Bauch vertraue? Absolut!" {n}Der Diener winkt, schaut über seine Schulter und schaudert leicht.{/n}
